item.description:
DECEMBER 5-6, 2007

The 2nd Annual SNCR Symposium & Awards Gala will feature the latest research and winning case studies from around the globe. Learn, discuss and have fun with your peers, industry experts and the most notable thinkers and practitioners in the world of new media and communications.

Enjoy a special dinner event and the presentation of the SNCR Awards, as well as several panels, presentations and discussions focusing on the SNCR Fellows' 2007 research initiatives.

Join us to discuss, learn and honor excellence in the use of new communications models and solutions.

See the full program details and agenda and register online at:
http://www.sncr.org/s...

group.name: Society for New Communications Research Symposium Event

item.name: 2nd Annual Society for New Communications Research Symposium & Awards Gala
